productInformation.Customer Reviews:
3.8 out of 5 stars








214 ratings






3.8 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewText: First part of the rating is that I just opened the box and plugged it in.  various places say it takes between 1-3 hrs to charge and 6-7 hrs to charge.  probably depends on which plug you use.  I am using the provided plug and it is slow.  be prepared to wait.  also the advertisement says it comes WITH Office Mobile App and shows the Microsoft Office Suite icons.  please note that nowhere does it actually say "Microsoft"  it says word, excel, power point, note.  It came with WPS Office Suite and Open Office included.  i had to download the Free version of Microsoft Office myself.  Not starting off in the most trustworthy way there.  I do like the color though it was the same as my monitor showed so you see what you are getting.  the USB port does accept a USB 2.0 plug, but have not tried to swap info using it yet.  it is in the middle of updating the apps and downloading the apps i use the most.  I will update this Rating as I get more in tune with the machine.  I will say that out of the box the cradle holds very securely but does not fight you when you try to dock/ undock.  it holds its position without a fuss and the screen appears very clear.  I plan to put it through its paces this weekend.

"  Great tablet. We. Ought it for our daughter. Shes very please. She uses it for games and school and works great for her needs. When we originally ordered it we ordered the purple version and unfortunately we received a blue one. We contacted the seller and they offered to exchange it for the correct color or give us a partial refund. We opted for the partial refund. The seller was quick to respond and quick to issue the refund. It was semi annoying that the order was messed up. It we are please at their quick response and quick action."

Got it for our 10 year old daughter for Christmas. She loves it and uses it all the time. It is nice to have the keyboard and take it off if you want. Works great so far. Hopefully it lasts a while. Our 12 year old wants one now.

"  I honestly wasnt expecting much when i ordered it because it was so cheap and especially after reading all the negative reviews, but it works pretty damn well i have yet to have any serious problems with it. Its cute portable and easy to use, absolutely love it so far."
Awesome tablet. Got it for my daughter for her birthday, shes 8. She has games and a couple movies played on it. We also bought a mouse and mousepad for easier play. No complaints!

"  I like the size and color of the device, but for the life of me, I cant figure out how to get the screen to respond quicker.  This is a good BASIC tablet, maybe for a teen, but if youre wanting it for business, I recommend paying the extra money and going with something like a Galaxy Tab."

I have had nothing butnpriblems with this tablet and I should have just returned it.  Ever since I added a second profile, it seemed to go haywire.  It is terribly laggy, even just in turning it on and choosing a profile.  Then you finally get in and choose an app or even try to swipe to second page of homescreen and it hangs up again.  It often tells me apps are not responding and asks if I want to wait or close, and I find I have to reboot it a lot because of the lag.  Also, it stated that it came with free Microsoft Office, but I found no evidence of that.  I though the keyboard would be useful, but I often find that it is not compatible with an app or website even, maki g it cumbersome.  Plus it disconnects easily, often causing your running app to reload or crash.

reviews.reviewTitle: "in a very sturdy case and the touch screen doesnt work well now"
reviews.reviewText: "  I purchased 4 of these one for each of my 4 children for xmas.  One only worked for a few hours and was returned the day after xmas.  One started freezing up and shutting down a few days later and was returned.  One somehow got a cracked screen, in a very sturdy case and the touch screen doesnt work well now. One of them is still working fine.  I dont think 1/4 is good odds!  Dont waste your money!!"
My husband has one and I loved it so thought I should get one for myself.  The keyboard is there when I need it otherwise the touch screen is awesome!

Pleasant surprise with this one. Ordering a second to replace older tablet. Keyboard attaches securely but easily removed as needed. Full size USB port so no adapters needed. Touchscreen responds as expected.

reviews.reviewTitle: Did not get the product pictured and displayed on the order....
reviews.reviewText: "  It was just delivered today....after looking at it I realise I didnt get the one that is in the picture.....ummmm I guess we will see how it works out."

After only a few months, this tablet has started to act up. It is frequently unable connect to the internet and requires a factory reset just to be able to connect to wifi again. I would not recommend this product to anyone who needs internet access with their tablet.
"  Awesome tablet and mini laptop. Takes up to 64gb cards. Camera isnt the best but its ok. Some of the bloatware is removable too!"

reviews.reviewTitle: Was able to get it set up very easily. The keyboard is easy to remove but not ...
reviews.reviewText: "  Just got this today. Was able to get it set up very easily. The keyboard is easy to remove but not too easy. I love that it has a usb port! As of right now the only thing I dislike about it is I wasnt able to find a place to update the software and the current version of Android device manager isnt compatible. Otherwise, I believe this will meet my needs."

I would love this, and I guess you get what you pay for, but it’s soooooooo slooooooooow.  It’s like 1992 computer slow. I only play cookie jam on it, so it’s not like I have things running in the background and yet it takes forever just to load anything. I didn’t expect much, but I sure didn’t expect the tablet to be this slow. This is right out of the box, I charged it fully, had it about 2 weeks now so haven’t made any updates. Maybe that would work.

I bought this to use for research and typing papers for school. Right out of the box it kept telling me I needed to update everything but also said that Google Play services weren\t on the device even though they were. Eventually it started working. Not even 24 hours later it\s repeatedly freezing and closing out anything I have open. It\s also very slow. The "charger" that came with it is absolutely pointless as it does nothing. I had to get a regular Android charger for it., Also, the tablet and keyboard are slightly different shades of purple., The battery did last a pretty good while straight out the box and connecting to and from the keyboard is quick and easy., "Overall, Im very disappointed as this is no better (if not worse than) the $30 RCA tablets at Wal-Mart."
Bought for my niece to enjoy streaming videos as well as getting paperwork done., Would recommend this for budget minded people
You get what you pay for. This is an actual computer (tablet & keyboard) under 100 dollars. Its also an intro to ANDROID before you invest in a 400 phone.
"  This is working well, though I have not figured out how to work the most part. Right now I have to do everything by touch screen. Otherwise its quite nice."
This is the third one we have purchased.  It is a great product, easy to use and very efficient.

reviews.reviewTitle: The only this unit does not have is a magnetic compass and calibrated altimeter
reviews.reviewText: Its the best most complete computer for its size and price on the market

"  Ordered this for my 10 yr. old daughter. Was a waste of money.  When you turn it on it is stuck in the word Viking and you cannot get it to work. I tried to reset it and it did once and since then it doesnt work. Wish I could get a refund. Its just a waste."

reviews.reviewTitle: It’s not ment for any actual work.
reviews.reviewText: It’s fairly small. The screen when it’s docked doesn’t have much of an angle. It does not come with office mobile app. It’s android 5.0 and the camera quality is bad. It’s not for school or for any actual work it’s more like a stream videos or play games kind of system. It’s not too bad but it’s not great. The system so far has not crashed and does not lag.
love the device used mostly for kindle app

Did alot of contemplating about buying this, its good value for the buck. Bought it for school, so mostly papers using micosoft. The keyboard could use some improvement but I like that its convenient.
With everything that happened, my daughter needed a quick fix until I could come up with something better. This was available, with prime shipping and works great.
I love my tablet! Small enough to be totally portable and much easier to use that my phone! I have office, apps, email, camera, text messaging!!

reviews.reviewTitle: You get what you pay for.
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for my daughter for Christmas. You get what you pay for. It lasted about 5 months but not quite. If you’re looking for a temporary cheap tablet then this is the one for you but if you’re shopping for quality, don’t purchase.
Broke do not know what was wrong but the people i got it from were the best and gave great service

Everything about this is good except for 1 thing. The reason i gave it 4 stars is the camera. If i could give it 4 1/2 stars i would. The keyboard is good and the tablet also. worth every penny. i recomend buying this if you are looking for a tablet.

reviews.reviewTitle: I purchased this tablet as a Christmas gift for my ...
reviews.reviewText: I  purchased this tablet as a Christmas gift for my daughter  during Black Friday .  Christmas Day she opened up her gift and the screen had a crack in it. So I was a little upset about the screen and that was the only issue I had.

"  I am not very happy with this device.  It was advertised to have office and a USB port.  However, I have not been able to use a USB flash drive to save my documents to the drive so I can then transfer my work to my desktop. It only reads sticks but does not write to them. Why on earth was this thing provided with a USB port? To attach more games and entertainment to it?  Neither does the tablet recognize my computer or vice versa.  Dont give me the song and dance that there is cloud.  I will NOT use cloud or any other program that puts security and privacy at risk. Yet that is all that seems to be useful on this tablet--things that share information and violate privacy.  Otherwise, it is a glorified toy that pretends to do work for you, but is only useful for play, entertainment and Hollywood.  I feel like I have been scammed, by false advertisement and false utilities.", "UPDATE:  I finally realized that the USB ports were probably defective. In talking to an Amazon representative, he confirmed my fears and made arrangements to return our tablets (my husbands does not work either).  So far my experience has found Amazon very good, in fact excellent, about their return policy."
Not bad for the price.
"  CANT GET WI FI ON IT OR PRINTING. NICE THRO. VERY HAPPY. CAN  YOU HELP?"
The Amazon ad for this product lies about one thing--there is no Office Mobile app or free subscriptions to Office online on the tablet I received.

reviews.reviewTitle: cheap 2-in-1 laptop with mobile office app and detachable keyboard
reviews.reviewText: Great value products,, *Price is good,less than $150, *Detachable keyboard with usb and MicroHDMI , easy to use, *Mobile office app is free on this device,word excel, PowerPoint ,also onenote,that is perfect ,great bouns., *IPS display., *microSD card slot, so far it is perfect for everyday use as a backup computer,recommend!
Horrible tablet not for me and the cursur sticks

I think it would be excellent for givimg to a non computer user to let them check email and sho, apping, facebook , and easy games., The biggest CON is that it is very slow after using top of the live computers. And Imall. But then I was looking for a small liught have longg fingers and find the keyboard somewhat small.

Email has stopped working notification every 30 seconds, pdf stopped working every minute, Horrible. Now I have to eat the money I spent on 3 of these and get new ones elsewhere"

qAndA.question: Is it easy to set the tablet up without expert setup??
qAndA.answer: Super easy if you already have a gmail you can log in with it and it sets everything up for you! I got this for my 8 year old ahe already has a phone so i just used her phones gmail

qAndA.question: Are the keyboard keys small size like a mobile phone?
qAndA.answer: These are commonly called a couple Keyboard. The width is the full 10.1 inches of the tablet and the keys are sized to match. They are not full size, but very comfortable to use. Also there is a built in glide pad as well. We now have 5 of these in our family and will purchase more for our Non-profit organization.

qAndA.question: How long does the computer have to charge because it was plugged in to the wall for well over 3 hours? And that it will not turn back on?

qAndA.question: Is this considered to be a lap top? I’m trying to download turbo tax for computers
qAndA.answer: It is not a laptop. You can download turbo tax only if it runs on the version of Android on your tablet. Try to download a version for a mobile device and check on which version of Android it requires.

qAndA.question: can i use aol on it?

qAndA.question: Does this viking pro flagship have flash player. the other viking pro with a 1.3 ghz processor did not have flash player.
qAndA.answer: Answer not available

qAndA.question: how long does it take to fully charge?
qAndA.answer: If u change it correctly the first time, with it turned off- i belive maybe after that 4hrs

qAndA.question: Need help. Tablet will not turn on or charge. purchased 6/5/2018. Can anyone help?
qAndA.answer: Maybe it died, which is why I no longer have my tablet.

qAndA.question: What cord connects the keyboard?
qAndA.answer: None. It attaches onto the keyboard via prongs like an aux jack.

qAndA.question: Is it Bluetooth headphone capable
qAndA.answer: Yes and my daughter loves it really nice for the price

qAndA.question: Can this play Netflix
qAndA.answer: Yes it can just install the app

qAndA.question: Can this run programs like Microsoft word?
qAndA.answer: It is an android operating system. It can run programs similar to word

qAndA.question: Does it have an integrated webcam?
qAndA.answer: Don't know it was a gift for a friend ,

qAndA.question: Does it have a camera
qAndA.answer: Yes. This does have a camera and I love mine and use it all the time. You can't go wrong with this.

qAndA.question: Does it have a front screen camera?
qAndA.answer: yes dual camera.

qAndA.question: Does it have Windows on it
qAndA.answer: No this does not have windows. However, it comes with Word, Excel, PowerPoint, etc. This is a tablet with an attachable keyboard. It is not a laptop!!!

qAndA.question: is it worth it.and a good xmas presant
qAndA.answer: I've had this tablet for about three months now and I really like it. It's not super fancy like an iPad or a note tablet, but it gets the job done. Runs pretty fast, nice battery life. I'm a college student and I use it for school mostly

qAndA.question: Does this come with a Charger?
qAndA.answer: yes

qAndA.question: Can it print to a wireless printer?
qAndA.answer: Yes

qAndA.question: Can I transfer photos and videos from my LG tribute 5 smart phone to this tablet then to flash drive for safe storage thank you..
qAndA.answer: Not sure if u can or can't. Sorry.

title: RCA Viking Pro Purple Edition 10.1 Touchscreen 2 In 1 Tablet Laptop, Detachable Keyboard, Free Office Moblie APP, Quad-Core Processor,32G storage, IPS Display, Android 5.0 Lollipop
